snippet: Samsung chief Jay Y. Lee has handpicked 13 top lawyers to defend him against charges of bribing the South Korean president, nearly all of them former judges or prosecutors, according to the court where one of the richest men in the country will be...

headline.main: US Admiral in Disputed South China Sea: 'We Will Be Here'
headline.print_headline: US Admiral in Disputed South China Sea: 'We Will Be Here'

lead_paragraph: Samsung chief Jay Y. Lee has handpicked 13 top lawyers to defend him against charges of bribing the South Korean president, nearly all of them former judges or prosecutors, according to the court where one of the richest men in the country will be tried.
